Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-grey pottery vessel, the fabric is light-brown in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of three lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394008) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394008)
